content.text: Find the mass of the cheese as a percentage of the mass of the mushrooms
Find the mass of butter needed to make a pasta bake to serve 18 people
Monica has 2.2 litres of milk and \(1.5\mathrm{kg}\) of each other ingredient
Calculate the greatest number of people she can serve with pasta bake
Here are the ingredients needed to make a pasta bake to serve 12 people

table.html:
250 g butter
600 g pasta
460 g mushrooms
280 g cheese
800 ml milk

content.text: Work out the cost in 2018

This was an increase of \(25\%\) of the cost of a packet in 2018

A shop places these packets in a single line on a shelf of length \(2\mathrm{m}\), correct to the nearest \(0.1\mathrm{m}\)
Find the maximum number of these packets that will fit along this shelf

Find the position vector of \(G\) in terms of \(\mathbf{p}\)
\(OABC\) is a trapezium with \(OA\) parallel to \(CB\)
\(M\) is the midpoint of \(CB\) and \(N\) is the point on \(AB\) such that \(AN: NB = 1: 2\)
\(O\) is the origin, \(\overrightarrow{OA} = \mathbf{p}\), \(\overrightarrow{OC} = \mathbf{q}\) and \(\overrightarrow{CB} = \frac{3}{4}\mathbf{p}\)
